author: Kevin
review: Spine of the Dragon by Kevin J. Anderson captivates readers with its richly woven tapestry of political intrigue and magical conflict. Set in a fantastical world teetering on the brink of war, Anderson skillfully navigates complex themes of power, betrayal, and redemption through a diverse cast of characters. While the narrative occasionally meanders, the book's intricate world-building and engaging plot keep readers invested till the very end. Despite its occasional flaws, Spine of the Dragon offers a thrilling escapade for fantasy enthusiasts craving adventure and depth.
